active.description: If false the admins of the bot can't access the dashboard.

created.description: Timestamp representing the date the bot was created

Get all tags from a business account.

Get all custom fields from a business account.

type.description: 0 - Text, 1 - Number, 2- Date (Unix timestamp), 3 - Date & Time (Unix timestamp), 4 - Boolean(0 or 1)

value.description: The value of the bot field. It is ignored for the contact custom field.

id.description: The ID of the new custom field

0 - Text, 1 - Number, 2- Date (Unix timestamp), 3 - Date & Time (Unix timestamp), 4 - Boolean(0 or 1)

get.description: Get bot field value by id

delete.description: Unset the value of a bot field

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: You can get template ID from the template link

get.description: Find contacts by custom field value. It will return maximum 100 contacts. The results are sorted by the last custom field value update for a contact.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Custom field ID. Use 'phone' or 'email' as custom field id if you want to find the contact by phone or email

get.description: Get all tags added to this contact

post.description: Add a tag to the contact

delete.description: remove a tag from the contact

phone.description: The phone number with country code

actions.description: Actions can be send flow, add/remove tags, set/unset custom field ...

get.description: Get all custom fields from a contact
Get custom field value by id

delete.description: remove a custom field from the contact

post.description: Send text message to the contact
Allows to run multiple actions and send multiple messages. Works for all channels.

message_tag.description: Only used by Messenger channel. Use Message channel to send messages outside 24h window

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the starting position of the first record to return in a paginated response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of records to return per request.

parameters.description: Specifies the starting position of the first record to return in a paginated response.

parameters.name: limit

status.description: won is positive and lost is negative

get.description: Get list of comments of an opportunity / ticket

parameters.description: Specifies the starting position of the first record to return in a paginated response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Sets the maximum number of records to return per request.

delete.description: Delete a comment of an opportunity / ticket

post.description: Send a product message to the contact

product_id.description: The product_id  field could be a single product id, an array of product ids, or multiple product ids separated by a comma

get.description: Get the contact cart ready for checkout

parameters.name: amount_received
parameters.description: Total value the contact paid in cents.

400.description: The amount received is less than the total value of the order.

402.description: The contact received a message on Messenger why the checkout failed.

status.name: status
status.description: The new order status. 6 - Processing, 7 - Shipped, 10 - Completed, 13 - Canceled.

zip_code.name: The zip code for the shipping

402.description: The order status is the same as the previous status

post.description: Add a product to contact cart

delete.description: remove a product from contact cart

active.description: if contacts can buy the product.

Cart.description: All value related to money is in cents

Order.description: All value related to money is in cents

created_timestamp.description: Date of the order in epoch/Unix timestamp

price.description: the price is not in cents

type.description: 0 - Text, 1 - Number, 2- Date (Unix timestamp), 3 - Date & Time (Unix timestamp), 4 - Boolean(0 or 1), 5- Long Text, 6 - Select, 7 - Multi Select

value.description: type == 0 then value is string, else value is a number

channel.description: 0 - Messenger, 2 - SMS, 5 - WhatsApp, 7 - Google Business Message, 8 - Telegram, 9 - Webchat

plan.description: 1 - Pro Subscription, 4 - FREE, 6 - Pro No Subscription, 11 - LTD, 12 - LTD, 13 - PRO Trial - Downgrade to FREE at the end, 15 - PRO Trial - Force to pay at the end

created.description: The date (UTC) when the account was created
